entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Manicouagan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac Manouane East 4:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
Temperature: -11.9°C
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -13.2°C
Wind: ESE 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Snow or freezing rain. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to freezing rain late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
